idea:
We take immense pleasure in introducing ourselves as the fastest growing organization in the engineering consultancy and manufacturing sector. Awarded by India's 5000 best MSME awards and National Achievers award for setting high-quality standards and excellence in the industry.


What do we do?

We do design, Manufacturing, Erection & Commissioning of process package equipment's and Instrumentation, sales & service of Instrumentation valves, Manufacturing of machined components for Oil & Gas, Pharmaceutical, Nuclear-Atomic Energy and Solar Energy Industries.
name: VD Technology Center

idea:
NikavSocio links all the marketing and HR strategies into one place. The idea behind NikavSocio is to provide next-level corporate relationship management solutions by digitalizing the marketing strategies, providing employee engagement activities and software & tools.

We Provide:

1.  Marketing Strategies/ Marketing Activities

2. Marketing Insights 

3. Employee engagement activities like- 

        (i) Outbound Trainings

        (ii) Corporate Events

        (iii) Skill development Training

4. Customized Corporate Gifting Solutions

5. Digital Marketing & Website development
name: NikavSocio

idea: 999 Entertainment and Marketing LLP specializes on the Marketing of Events from Conceptualization, to Strategizing, to Marketing and finally to sales of the Event.
